name: Send Nodes
description:
Description

Nodes are coming for your beautiful cone! Collect them with your energy lasers and incorporate them into your network instead.

This game was created in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 Features
  • Exciting drag & drop node action!
  • Build a network of laser traps!
  • Ethereal soundtrack to vibe to!
Controls
  • Mouse
  • Drag and drop nodes to move them out of the trajectory of incoming nodes
  • Catch incoming nodes with your energy lasers and incorporate them into your network for maximum profit
